title: Greater Manchester Police officer charged with sexual assault
article: A student police officer has been charged with sexual assault. Ryan Pointon, 27, is due to appear at Manchester and Salford Magistrates' Court on 16 March after being charged with the offence. Greater Manchester Police said the officer, who was based in Manchester city centre, had been suspended from duty. Misconduct proceedings will recommence once the criminal proceedings have concluded, the force added.Why not follow BBC North West on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram ?
